scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/nextjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nextjs lint && pnpm -C apps/nestjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nestjs lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm -C apps/nextjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nextjs lint:fix && pnpm -C apps/nestjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nestjs lint:fix
scripts.pret: pnpm -C apps/nextjs format && pnpm -C apps/nestjs format
scripts.pret:fix: pnpm -C apps/nextjs format && pnpm -C apps/nestjs format
scripts.biome: pnpm -C apps/nextjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nextjs lint && pnpm -C apps/nestjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nestjs lint
scripts.biome:fix: pnpm -C apps/nextjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nextjs lint:fix && pnpm -C apps/nestjs typecheck && pnpm -C apps/nestjs lint:fix
scripts.biome:summary: pnpm -C apps/nextjs lint && pnpm -C apps/nestjs lint
scripts.docker:build: pnpm biome && docker build -f apps/nextjs/Dockerfile -t next-nest/nextjs:latest . && docker build -f apps/nestjs/Dockerfile -t next-nest/nestjs:latest .
scripts.docker:deploy: pnpm docker:build && docker stack deploy -c docker-stack.yml next-nest
